title: Heat flows on hyperbolic spaces
abstract: In this paper we develop new methods for studying the convergence problem for the heat flow on negatively curved spaces and prove that any quasiconformal map of the sphere S^(n−1), n ≥ 3, can be extended to the n-dimensional hyperbolic space such that the heat flow starting with this extension converges to a quasi-isometric harmonic map. This implies the Schoen-Li-Wang conjecture that every quasiconformal map of S^(n−1), n ≥ 3, can be extended to a harmonic quasi-isometry of the n-dimensional hyperbolic space.
note:
(Submitted on 14 Jun 2015) 

Vladimir Markovic is supported by the NSF grant number DMS-1500951.
